description.name: Description
description.value: With a quarter of a century of dining under its belt, Acquerello on Sacramento Street in Nob Hill is a neighbourhood favourite. Over the years the fine Italian cooking has gained it plenty of awards including a recent second Michelin star. The interiors are simple with a traditionally beamed ceiling, an understated setting for the standout dishes. Plump for the Prix Fixe menu or the seasonal tasting menu, which are bursting with classic Italian flavours with a modern twist. The carefully researched wine list is a showstopper in itself.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: San Francisco's Acquerello Italian restaurant is a two Michelin-starred dining spot known for its excellence.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: San Francisco's Acquerello Italian restaurant is a two Michelin-starred dining spot known for its excellence.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: The chef plates up some of the most creative Italian cooking around. Try the seasonal tasting menu with matched wines. Service here is unrivalled.

description.name: Description
description.value: At the hidden Michelin-starred gem in Ginza, Chef Naoto Adachi will serve you sublime dishes made with seasonal ingredients showcasing his sophisticated skills in traditional Japanese cuisine.  You can choose from three tasting menus, with optional but highly recommended wine and sake add-ons. Each course features stars of the show like Sea Urchin in a dashi stock, Ebi with shitake mushroom in a white miso broth, Sashimi of the freshest Ebi, bluefin tuna, and more served with the most delicious ponzu sauce and desserts like you've never had them before. The genius of each dish lies in its simplicity, with delicate and refined creations.  The space is bright, elegant, and contemporary Japanese, with tables set along a counter overlooking the kitchen.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: At the hidden Michelin-starred gem in Ginza, Chef Naoto Adachi will serve you sublime dishes made with seasonal ingredients.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: At the hidden Michelin-starred gem in Ginza, Chef Naoto Adachi will serve you sublime dishes made with seasonal ingredients showcasing his sophisticated skills in traditional Japanese cuisine.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: You have to try one of their stellar soups in a house-blend dashi stock featuring the finest in-season ingredients like fugu (puffer fish) in winters, nimono soups featuring either snow crab Shinjo or nodoguro with deep-fried tofu.

description.value: At the hidden Michelin-starred gem in Ginza

short_description.value: At the hidden Michelin-starred gem in Ginza

description.name: Description
description.value: This thrill ride is not for the faint of heart, but if you can take the height, you can take a breathtaking, romantic nighttime helicopter ride over the downtown metropolis or opt for a daytime trip further afield to Mt. Fuji.  Daytime cruises of 10, 20 or 30 minutes are also available. Departs from a conveniently located helipad in Shin-Kiba, easily accessible via public transportation or taxi. Reservations available online or by phone, but currently only in Japanese.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Soar above breathtaking landscapes on a romantic midnight helicopter flight above the city or a daytime trip to Mt. Fuji.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Soar above breathtaking landscapes on a romantic midnight helicopter flight above the city or a daytime trip to Mt. Fuji.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: A clear day activity however you can reschedule or get a refund in the event of bad weather.

description.name: Description
description.value: In addition to a complete range of holistic spa treatments, this lofty modern Zen den has large Japanese-style hot baths, aroma steam rooms and an indoor pool where you can lap up some of the city's finest vistas. The eight private treatment rooms are done in soothing cypress and spotless white linens for a clean, simple aesthetic. The traditional Japanese kampo herbal treatments change seasonally - in spring go for the magnolia and cherry blossom massage, in autumn it's all about the herb foot bath.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Visit Aman Spa for holistic treatments, Japanese-style hot baths, aroma steam rooms, and Kampo herbal therapies.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Visit Aman Spa for holistic treatments, Japanese-style hot baths, aroma steam rooms, and Kampo herbal therapies.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: If you aren't staying at the hotel, the full-day Aman Wellness Programme gets you access to all the fitness facilities, plus a massage or facial and macrobiotic lunch.

description.name: Description
description.value: Aman's Tokyo debut wows with its sensational minimalist charcoal and blond design by Kerry Hill. Mount Fuji and the glittering Skytree are the sensational backdrop to serene, pared-back rooms of Japanese wood and washi paper. The Restaurant looks over the Imperial Palace and serves Japanese-Italian fusion from chef Eiji Ohata as elegant as the setting, with their special inhouse sake and an extensive cellar of world wines. For more relaxed dining, there's The Caf, and for relaxation, a sky-high lap pool and onsen-inspired spa.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: The Aman luxury resort offers modern style and flawless service in a city-center location.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: The Aman luxury resort offers modern style and flawless service in a city-center location.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Non-guests can access the pool and spa when booking a full-day Aman Wellness Programme, which includes private yoga lesson, spa treatment and lunch.

description.name: Description
description.value: A favorite of curry connoisseurs in Virginia and beyond, Amiraj (formerly Nawab Indian Cuisine) features traditional Indian cuisine prepared with a twist, and a world-class wine list with more than 170 wines from around the globe. The contemporary setting with low lighting and plush seating, only enhances your exotic dining experience.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Amiraj (formerly Nawab Indian Cuisine) is a famous and Indian authentic for curry enthusiasts in Virginia & beyond

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: A favorite of curry connoisseurs in Virginia and beyond, Amiraj (formerly Nawab Indian Cuisine) features traditional Indian cuisine

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Looking for a flavor experience like no other? Amiraj recommends pairing their Coconut-seared Scallops with a nice Black Cherry Old-Fashioned cocktail or Ginger Martini.

description.name: Description
description.value: This offering from Hyatt's boutique chain melds walnut and washi paper with mid-20th century decor, checkerboard cabinetry and wow vistas for just the right combination of retro charm and modern luxury. Rooms feature Japanese-style sliding shoji partitions to customize your space and deep-soaking tubs. AO Spa offers personalized treatments and in-house restaurant Andaz Tavern has European provincial cuisine, rooftop sips and live music, but the hotel's convenient location in the Toranomon Hills shopping complex means plenty of dining options are close to hand.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Andaz Tokyo Toranomon Hills offers a lively rooftop bar, diverse dining, and unique design.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Andaz Tokyo Toranomon Hills offers a lively rooftop bar, diverse dining, and unique design.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Take advantage of the views by booking a room on the south overlooking Tokyo Tower, or the north for Tokyo Skytree.

description.name: Description
description.value:
This sleek and sophisticated, 223-seat Italian restaurant at the Borgata is the brainchild of Michael Symon, Iron Chef and former co-host of The Chew on ABC. His wife designed the vintage-inspired interior, and the menu items are inspired by family dishes he enjoyed while growing up in Sicily.

  Insider tip: Talk about a selection, the restaurant's wine collection houses over 40,000 vintages.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: This sleek and sophisticated, 223-seat Italian restaurant at the Borgata is the brainchild of Michael Symon

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: This sleek and sophisticated, 223-seat Italian restaurant at the Borgata is the brainchild of Michael Symon

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Talk about a selection, the restaurant's wine collection houses over 40,000 vintages.

hours_widget__hours_of_operation.value: Tue-Thu, Sun 5pm-9:30pm; Fri 5pm-10:30pm; Sat 5pm-11pm; Mon Closed

description.value: Upscale restaurant Argento works for everything from business meetings to dinner deux.  Floor to ceiling windows showcase spectacular views over the Ginza district while the menu is an exquisite blend of French cuisine and local ingredients.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Argento is an upscale restaurant that caters to various occasions, including business meetings or a romantic dinner.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Argento is an upscale restaurant that caters to various occasions, including business meetings or a romantic dinner.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: While Argento offers Italian cuisine at a luxurious level,  they also offer a three- and four-course childrens' menu.

description.name: Description
description.value: With a passion for the ancient ways of cooking in the region of Antequera, Arte de Cozina reinterprets traditional meals using seasonal ingredients and organic livestock. Experts on wine and beer pairing are on staff to help you elevate your meal to new heights.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Arte de Cozina in Antequera passionately reinterprets traditional meals with seasonal ingredients and organic livestock.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: With a passion for the ancient ways of cooking in the region of Antequera, Arte de Cozina reinterprets traditional meals using seasonal ingredients and organic livestock.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Take your favorite menu item from Arte de Cozina back to your familys kitchen table with their recipe cards, which are available with each dish and includes a list of ingredients and details of preparation.

address1.value: Take your favorite menu item from Arte de Cozina back to your familys kitchen table with their recipe cards, which are available with each dish and includes a list of ingredients and details of preparation.

system.name: Artizen Crafted American Kitchen and Bar

name.name: Name
name.value: Artizen Crafted American Kitchen and Bar

description.name: Description
description.value: This gorgeous azure blue restaurant with copper lighting fixtures serves inventive American dishes and a collection of handcrafted cocktails. Start your dining experience by ordering their tangy Last Chance to Lose your Keys cocktail, a fusion of mescal, Blanco tequila, and lemon, pineapple, and jalapeno honey.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: The azure blue restaurant with copper lighting fixtures offers innovative American dishes & a range of handcrafted cocktails

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: This gorgeous azure blue restaurant with copper lighting fixtures serves inventive American dishes and a collection of handcrafted cocktails.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Reserve a seat at the Tipsy Tea Party (Saturdays 2pm-5pm), served with ceviche, wontons, cucumber sandwiches, fine spirits, a sampling of teas, and sparkling wines.

description.name: Description
description.value: Arva is a new dining concept conceived by Executive Chefs Stefano Artosin and Andrea Torre. Now open at Aman Tokyo, this unique new dining experience is based on inventive Italian cooking techniques, utilising simple, locally-sourced ingredients. Paying tribute to Italy's rich culinary heritage, Arva celebrates the shared enjoyment of uncomplicated flavours in a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Arva is a dining concept created by Executive Chefs Stefano Artosin and Andrea Torre.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Arva is a dining concept created by Executive Chefs Stefano Artosin and Andrea Torre.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Many locals and hotel guests head to Arva for their happy hour.  End your day sipping signature cocktails with a watching the sunset over the Tokyo skyline.

description.name: Description
description.value: Savor a complimentary glass of sparkling wine with any multi-course sitting.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Savor a complimentary glass of sparkling wine with any multi-course sitting.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Savor a complimentary glass of sparkling wine with any multi-course sitting.

description.name: Description
description.value: This sultry hideaway amid Roppongi's frenetic nightlife offers three floors of fine Japanese dining until the early hours. At the basement level, marble-topped counters surround pristine teppan grills topped by massive Ottoman lamps, where degustations of wagyu are cooked right in front of you. On the first floor, sushi chefs prepare fresh fish dishes at a traditional wood counter. And on the second floor, there's a private teppan room ideal for business meals or a romantic interlude. There's also a lounge bar with squishy leather armchairs to while away the night and settle your full stomach.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Enjoy a delicious meal of teppanyaki and sushi at a sultry late-night spot just steps from Roppongi Hills.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Enjoy a delicious meal of teppanyaki and sushi at a sultry late-night spot just steps from Roppongi Hills.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: The mascarpone ice cream with hot green tea makes for a nice finish, whatever your meal.

description.name: Description
description.value: Pizza is just the start! The menu here is extensive that includes burgers, fish tacos and salads. Youll find a kids menu and even a Chicago-Style Deep Dish Pizza.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Pizza is just the start! The menu here is extensive that includes burgers, fish tacos and salads.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Pizza is just the start! The menu here is extensive that includes burgers, fish tacos and salads.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Cathedral City is located between Palm Springs and Rancho Mirage, easily accessible from all of the towns in the area.

description.name: Description
description.value: Black Bar with movie Kingsman concept has Single Malt Scotch Whiskies with the highest quality in Korea.  Bartenders come from a variety of field; world class bartenders, Chefs, and baristas. Enjoy a variety of stylish cocktails, including Signature cocktail inspired Kingsman.  Unique door concept, put hand in mouth of Lion's Mouth. Popular place for drama broadcasting shooting highlighting their chic & unique interior.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Inspired by the movie Kingsman, Black Bar offers premium Single Malt Scotch Whiskies and stylish cocktails.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Inspired by the movie Kingsman, Black Bar offers premium Single Malt Scotch Whiskies and stylish cocktails.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Black Bar offers private rooms perfect for personal or business occasions.

description.name: Description
description.value: Enjoy a complimentary welcome drink.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Enjoy a complimentary welcome drink.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Enjoy a complimentary welcome drink.

description.name: Description
description.value: Tokyo's stylish expats and homegirls love this foxy, red velvet-draped girly den for waxing, mani/pedis, and facials. Fully bilingual, up to date in international trends and obsessed with customer service, Boudoir is a beauty gem in the heart of Harajuku and a lifesaver for frazzled fashionistas. Check ahead for seasonal specials or get purses out for the Mommy 911 package. With a facial plus nail shaping and coloring, you'll be primped, prepped and rejuvenated in record time. Satisfaction guaranteed or they will redo the treatment.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Boudoir, Tokyo's plush red velvet escape awaits to meet all your beauty needs.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Boudoir, Tokyo's plush red velvet escape awaits to meet all your beauty needs.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: No children under 10 allowed. Post pamper, head around the corner to crepe stand Prla for seasonal adult versions with fancy ingredients like gorgonzola cheese, calvados jelly and raw passionfruit.

system.name: Brasserie Paul Bocuse Daimaru Tokyo - Dining

name.name: Name
name.value: Brasserie Paul Bocuse Daimaru Tokyo - Dining

description.name: Description
description.value: Connected to Tokyo station, Brasserie Paul Bocuse Daimaru Tokyo is a casual dining experience that immediately transports you to the South of France. The restaurant is set on the 12th floor and is modelled after the "Le SUD," a brasserie in Lyon, France.  Guests enjoy views of the open kitchen along with the surrounding area through the large windows.  The menu features classic French cuisine with items like Bouillabaisse and Confit Chicken. Save room for the delicious Crme Burlee; it is a house speciality.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Brasserie Paul Bocuse Daimaru Tokyo offers casual French cuisine inspired by Le SUD in Lyon, serving traditional dishes.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Brasserie Paul Bocuse Daimaru Tokyo offers casual French cuisine inspired by Le SUD in Lyon, serving traditional dishes.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Connoisseurs take note. The Brasserie's wine selection is impressive. Purchased directly from French makers, guests can enjoy the finest wines at exceptional prices.

description.name: Description
description.value: For over 50 years, Chef Paul Bocuse has been educating the next generation of chefs on the traditions of French cuisine.  Located in the Ginza neighbourhood, Brasserie Paul Bocuse Ginza owes much to the "Fond Rose" his high-end brasserie in Lyon, France.  Diners will be spoilt for choice with an impressive selection of fresh seafood, meats and vegetarian dishes while the desserts should not be missed. Save room to try the Crme Brulee.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Brasserie Paul Bocuse Ginza, a high-end brasserie offers fresh seafood, meats, and vegetarian dishes.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Brasserie Paul Bocuse Ginza, a high-end brasserie offers fresh seafood, meats, and vegetarian dishes.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Look out for the monthly cooking class at Brasserie Paul Bocuse Ginza followed by a three-course meal.

description.name: Description
description.value: How can you go wrong with a restaurant that was named Open Tables: Diners Choice Winner for Best Overall, Best Ambiance and Best Food? The Italian cuisine is fabulous, and the setting with painted murals and sparkling chandeliers, is right for casual to date-night dining.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: How can you go wrong with a restaurant that was named Open Tables: Diners Choice Winner for Best Overall

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: How can you go wrong with a restaurant that was named Open Tables: Diners Choice Winner for Best Overall

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Their Sunday Brunch is $48 and worth every penny (pricing is subject to change).

description.name: Description
description.value: Offering authentic Roman and Tuscan cuisine made with fresh local and seasonal ingredients, Casa Nonna will make you feel like youve been transported to the heart of Italy. Offering both a la carte and family style options, there is a mouth-watering selection for all appetites big and small

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Offering authentic Roman and Tuscan cuisine made with fresh local and seasonal ingredients,

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Offering authentic Roman and Tuscan cuisine made with fresh local and seasonal ingredients,

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: No Italian meal is complete without a delicious glass of wine, and Casa Nonna offers an extensive wine list, making drink pairing a breeze.

description.name: Description
description.value: In a tiny, 10-seat-only bistro-style dining room close to Tokyo Dome, Chef Takeo Moro, formerly of the late lamented elBulli, crafts whimsical modern Italian dishes that appeal to the eye as much as the palate. His colorful omakase course changes each month to make the most of seasonal ingredients and incorporates just enough molecular trickery to keep things surprising, without losing the stick-to-your-ribs heartiness of mamma's cucina. Add a well-curated wine list and you have all the ingredients for an unforgettable night out.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: At a stone's throw from Tokyo Dome, El Bulli alumni Takeo Moro serves up a whimsical modern Italian experience.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: At a stone's throw from Tokyo Dome, El Bulli alumni Takeo Moro serves up a whimsical modern Italian experience.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Book ahead.

description.name: Description
description.value: Although twice recipient of a Michelin star, this simple, affordable restaurant in the center of Kamiyacho still feels like an undiscovered gem. Chef Yukihiro Kitamura, who trained in Trentino-Alto Adige in the Italian Alps serves local fare from the north of Italy that is beautifully prepared, delicious and true to its roots - especially the handmade pastas. Both set-course menus and la carte options are available for lunch and dinner, and the knowledgeable sommelier will recommend a perfectly paired wine.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Faithfully recreated Northern Italian deserving of its Michelin star

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Low-key, intimate restaurant for Michelin-starred north Italian fare.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: The set-course lunch is probably the best-value Michelin meal in town.

description.name: Description
description.value: Since 1950, this peaceful oasis in Atago has been preparing vegetarian kaiseki meals with fresh seasonal produce purchased each morning at the Tsukiji wholesale market. In their Zen private dining rooms with tranquil garden views, unobtrusive staff serve exquisitely prepared and beautifully presented meals, encouraging you to take a moment to relax and reflect on the importance of food. Several course options are available at both lunch and dinner, but try to book ahead for the tea ceremony. Dishes use some dried bonito and eggs, but they can prepare a completely vegan meal with advance notice.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Tranquil Zen retreat in Atago Green Hills for vegetarian kaiseki

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Escape the city hustle at this tranquil retreat specializing in vegetarian kaiseki.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: The tea ceremony has to be booked in advance.

system.name: Daikanyama ASO Celeste Futako Tamagawa - Dining

name.name: Name
name.value: Daikanyama ASO Celeste Futako Tamagawa - Dining

description.name: Description
description.value: This upscale Italian restaurant is the perfect escape from the city hubbub. Celeste means "blue sky" in Italian and informs the calming interiors: elegant high ceilings, large windows and, of course, blue and white dcor.  While diners can enjoy a seasonal creative menu and outstanding service. A prix fixe lunch and dinner menu are also available.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: This upscale Italian restaurant is the perfect escape from the city hubbub.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: This upscale Italian restaurant is the perfect escape from the city hubbub.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Check out the two-story glass-fronted wine cellar that houses over 3,000 bottles in the middle of the restaurant.

full_address.name: Full Address
full_address.value: 3-17-1 Tamagawa, Takashimaya SC South Tower 11F, Tokyo

description.name: Description
description.value: Located in historic Nihonbashi district, where traditional charm and ultra-modern architecture meet, is Daikanyama ASO Celeste Nihonbashi.  This restaurant offers Italian cuisine in a relaxed and welcoming setting.  Interiors are blue and white riffing off "Celeste," which means "blue sky" in Italian. The menu features beautifully crafted fish, meat and pasta dishes using only local producers.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: The casual Italian caf in Daikanyama's historical area is blue and white like "Celeste," Italian for "blue sky."

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: The casual Italian caf in Daikanyama's historical area is blue and white like "Celeste," Italian for "blue sky."

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: After a busy day of shopping at one of Japan's oldest department stores, Daikanyama ASO Celeste Nihonbashi is a perfect location for a leisurely lunch or afternoon tea.

name.name: Name
name.value: endota Online Wellness Complete Retreat - Spas

description.name: Description
description.value: Move, nourish and grow with endota Retreat from the comfort of your home - 365 days a year. Join as a Complete Retreat member and access their best selling seasonal skincare, nurturing spa treatments and our on-demand wellness classes, courses, and recipes. Kickstart your wellness journey today.

short_description.value: Move, nourish and grow with endota Retreat from the comfort of your home.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Move, nourish and grow with endota Retreat from the comfort of your home.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips

description.name: Description
description.value: Esterre is a fine dining restaurant showcasing contemporary French haute cuisine in partnership with DUCASSE Paris. Located in the luxurious Palace Hotel in Tokyo, you can enjoy panoramic views of the verdant Kokyo Gaien National Garden and Wadakura Moat.  Opened in November 2019, the restaurant is listed as a one-star restaurant in "Michelin Guide Tokyo 2022." Chef, Martin Pitarque Palomar, who studied under Ducasse, creates a harmonious fusion of French and Japanese cuisines. Their seasonal set menus are focussed on seafood and vegetables delivered from a farm in Yamanashi Prefecture. The result is dishes as beautiful to the eye as to the palate. A core pillar of the restaurant is local sourcing. In line with Ducasse's philosophy of uncovering what high-quality ingredients can be found in a given destination and then applying French culinary techniques to their preparation, Esterre serves up the best produce from Japan.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Esterre is a fine dining restaurant showcasing contemporary French haute cuisine in partnership with DUCASSE Paris.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Esterre is a fine dining restaurant showcasing contemporary French haute cuisine in partnership with DUCASSE Paris.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Check out their impressive wine collection of 600 varieties, from Champagne to red, ros, white, and dessert wines. They also have over 17 varieties available by the glass and non-alcoholic sparkling wines on the menu.

summary.name: Summary

description.name: Description
description.value: This darkly dapper, counter-ringed open kitchen where up-and-coming chef Hiroyasu Kawate creates 13 courses (six at lunch) of inventive, impeccably finessed French-Japanese fare is much in demand among Tokyo's in-the-know epicureans. The menu changes every two months; each course is served personally by a chef who explains the ingredients' background and seasonality and even the plateware's provenance - nearly all of which is sourced from small producers around Japan as a point of pride. Allow at least 3-4 hours for dinner - it's an impeccable dining experience.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: The up-and-coming chef, Hiroyasu Kawate, creates magic, combining Japanese sensibility with French fine dining.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: The up-and-coming chef, Hiroyasu Kawate, creates magic, combining Japanese sensibility with French fine dining.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Reservations accepted up to two months in advance.

description.name: Description
description.value: At the north end of town, 1501 Uptown is a massive space with retractable glass doors that open the entire restaurant to outdoor seating and lovely breezes as the summer heat cools down. Serving dinner and weekend brunch, the gastropub menu is creative and will keep everyone from vegan to staunch carnivore happy. The team can advise on pairing dishes to cocktails, wine, and both bottled and 20+ draught beers.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: At 1501 Uptown, a vast facet retractable glass doors opening the entire restaurant to outdoor seats, offering lovely breezes.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: At the north end of town, 1501 Uptown is a massive space with retractable glass doors that open the entire restaurant to outdoor seating and lovely breezes as the summer heat cools down.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: There are plenty of choices for anyone following gluten free or vegan diets and the menu makes those choices very clear.

description.name: Description
description.value: Chefs Jo and Saki traveled far and wide throughout Thailand, discovering novel ingredients and new cooking techniques that create 80/20 innovative, exciting approaches to traditional Thai cuisine. Located in an industrial-chic converted shophouse in Bangkok's trendy Talad Noi District, 80/20 is equal parts casual and edgy. Raw concrete and black metal structures mix with colorful murals, and guests choose between seats in the main dining room or along the counter facing the open kitchen.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Chefs Jo and Saki traveled to Thailand to uncover new ingredients and techniques to make 80/20 intriguing Thai food.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Chefs Jo and Saki traveled to Thailand to uncover new ingredients and techniques to make 80/20 intriguing Thai food.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Chefs Jo and Saki have travelled far and wide throughout Thailand, discovering novel ingredients and new cooking techniques that now inform their innovative, exciting approach to traditional Thai cuisine. Folksy ingredients such as caviar-sized aquatic flowering plants found in rural ponds, known as Asian watermeal, and black chicken from the Northeast feature prominently, along with koji-fermented fish sauce, produced in their own fermentation lab.

description.name: Description
description.value: Restaurant #8, at the Hyatt in Chengdu, serves Sichuan's hot pot dishes, along with other authentic local delicacies, while its "market" theme provides an interactive and engaging Chengdu restaurant experience. This hotpot shop feels like a market with a cornucopia of every ingredient you can think of - from live seafood, mushrooms, meats, and leafy greensto Australian Wagyu chuck, fresh goose intestines and minced shrimp paste. Guests enter the restaurant through the market area where they can see the fresh produce being prepared and portioned by their expert chefs.  Top choices of soup bases include the old Chengdu-style mala butter base and the river fish broth with green Sichuan peppercorns and pickles. Don't forget to try their sour plum tea brewed fresh daily. They also offer private dining rooms at a minimum charge.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Restaurant #8, at the Hyatt in Chengdu, serves Sichuan's hot pot dishes, along with other authentic local delicacies.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Restaurant #8, at the Hyatt in Chengdu, serves Sichuan's hot pot dishes, along with other authentic local delicacies.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Finish off the hot meal with their delicious fresh mango ice cream for dessert.

description.name: Description
description.value: Located 350 metres up Toronto's CN Tower, in the heart of the Entertainment District, 360 Restaurant provides diners with an unforgettable experience thanks to breathtaking revolving views of the city. Perfect for that extra-special occasion, extra-large windows encircle the award-winning restaurant providing incredible vistas. Enjoy market-fresh cuisine from the seasonal menu featuring only the best regional ingredients, and complete your culinary adventure with a bottle of wine from the 'cellar in the sky' which houses more than 550 national and international varieties. It holds the Guinness World Record for the world's highest cellar!

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: The CN Tower's spectacular 350-metre-high revolving restaurant offers sweeping panoramic views

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Take in jaw-dropping views from the revolving 360 Restaurant located 350 metres above the ground atop Toronto's impressive CN Tower.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: After your meal, access to the LookOut and Glass Floor levels in the CN Tower is complimentary for any guest who has purchased a prix fixe. Some of the restaurant's top recipes can be found on the website.

description.name: Description
description.value: Besides the award-winning New Ameriican and Pacific Rim cuisine, this contemporary-casual restaurant and bar is known for its spectacular tableside views of Ala Wai Harbor. Watch the sun rise as you enjoy a hearty breakfast (we love the Keike French Toast with sweet bread, whipped cream and coconut syrup), or come for the live tunes every Sunday through Wednesday from 6pm-8pm.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Besides the award-winning New Ameriican and Pacific Rim cuisine,

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Besides the award-winning New Ameriican and Pacific Rim cuisine,

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Reserve their 'INDULGE: A Signature Grazing Experience' (Thursday, Friday & Saturday from 5pm-9:30pm), to sample Chef Joseph Almoguera's culinary skills at their very best.

description.name: Description
description.value: Abysse the restaurant represents "Deep sea, deep things". They offer dishes that maximize the goodness of the season and its ingredients, centering on the diverse and abundant fish and shellfish that Japan is proud of in the world. Chef Kotaro Meguro makes careful use of Japan's abundant natural resources using the theme 'ocean and forest' and their connection with nature. Their menu is seasonal and changes 4 times a year, reflecting the finest ingredients at their peak, with flavors from the ocean & forests.  Abysse is a place full of excitement, ocean- and forest-themed interiors, artisanal serving dishes, and music to match. Take a moment to savor new tastes and get inspired, all while enjoying an irreplaceable time with your loved one.

short_description.name: Short Description
short_description.value: Abysse is a restaurant that focuses on seasonal dishes, utilizing Japan's abundant fish and shellfish.

summary.name: Summary
summary.value: Abysse is a restaurant that focuses on seasonal dishes, utilizing Japan's abundant fish and shellfish.

insider_tips.name: Insider Tips
insider_tips.value: Go for their 11-course set menu for Lunch with wine and tea pairings while dinner features 13 dishes with a choice of wine, champagne, and tea.
